definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花崗岩粉碎，採煤，硅酸鹽礦石內植入礦物。

sentences.english: Treatment of restaurant wastewater with polysilicate aluminium was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以聚硅酸鋁爲混凝劑，用化學法絮凝處理餐飲廢水。

sentences.english: Chemical features of these granites are consistent with silicate liquid immiscibility.
sentences.chinese: 它們的化學特徵可以用硅酸鹽液態不混熔來解釋。

sentences.english: Alkali-free aluminosilicate glass is a kind of special glass used in many fields.
sentences.chinese: 無鹼鋁硅酸鹽玻璃是一種應用範圍較廣的特種玻璃。

sentences.english: A new process for producing high - purity silica from silicofluoric acid is introduced .
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種用氟硅酸制高純二氧化硅的新工藝。

sentences.english: The method of preparing crystalline sodium disilicate has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了合成結晶型層狀二聚硅酸鈉的方法。

sentences.english: The preparation of laminated crystalline sodium silicate from flake caustic soda was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對用片狀燒鹼製備層狀結晶硅酸鈉進行了探討。

sentences.english: The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz .
sentences.chinese: 輻射光源或用硼硅酸鹽玻璃或用石英過濾。

sentences.english: And what mechanism can get rid of the silicate core that has not been broken by the tides?
sentences.chinese: 硅酸鹽核心又是在何種機理作用下不被潮汐力摧毀？

sentences.english: It properly discusses the acting mechanism of micro-calcium silicate as well.
sentences.chinese: 文中對微孔硅酸鈣的反應機理也作了適當的論述。

sentences.english: With further hydrolysis in the body tissues, silicic acid could be formed.
sentences.chinese: 隨着在身體組織裏的進一步水解，可以生成硅酸。

sentences.english: Process for the preparation of fluoboric acid from fluosilicic acid, a byproduct of phosphate was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了利用磷肥副產氟硅酸製備氟硼酸的新工藝。

sentences.english: The borosilicate glass was strengthened by using low temperature ion exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 採用低溫型離子交換法對硼硅酸鹽玻璃進行增強。

sentences.english: The rice husk is a ligneous hard layer of the cereal with high silicate content.
sentences.chinese: 稻殼灰是具有高硅酸鹽含量的穀類的一種木質的硬層。

sentences.english: The preparation of sodium metasilicate pentahydrate using aqueous crystallization method is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對採用溶液結晶法制取五水偏硅酸鈉進行了研究。

sentences.english: By the hydrolyzation of potassium fluorosilicate , the hydrolyzation can be validated absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 通過對氟硅酸鉀分析純的水解，驗證此方法水解完全。
